details.questions:
The primary purpose of careful and nice code layout of a software system is to（）.
仔细和漂亮的软件系统代码布局的主要目的是（）。

details.options:
[{"Key":"A","Value":"

Add comments

"},{"Key":"B","Value":"

Use a short name of the variable

"},{"Key":"C","Value":"

Make a meaningful name of the variable meaningful

"},{"Key":"D","Value":"

Construct an appropriate layout of the code.

"}]
details.questions:
In the following statement, which cannot be a good programming practice?（）
在下面的语句中，哪个不能是写代码的标准？（）

details.options:
[{"Key":"A","Value":"

In a software program, variable names should be meaningful.

"},{"Key":"B","Value":"

If the programmers are careful and experienced enough, they can write self-documenting code.

"},{"Key":"C","Value":"

Comments are helpful for code readers.

"},{"Key":"D","Value":"

In a software program, variable names should be consistent.

"}]
details.questions:
Which of the following statements about good programming practice is wrong?（）
以下语句中哪个关于良好的编程实践的描述是错误的？（）

The following graph shows the modules of a software system, and the line in the graph shows the invocation relation between the modules. If the system is implemented and integrated using the bottom-up type, module（）is the driver of the module b.
下图显示了软件系统的模块，图中的线显示了模块之间的调用关系。 如果系统是使用自底向上类型实现和集成的，模块（）是模块b的驱动程序。

Which of the following will be the last one to be considered when choosing a programming language?（）
在选择编程语言时，应该最后考虑以下哪项？（）

details.options:
[{"Key":"A","Value":"

Surely, integration should follow implementation.

"},{"Key":"B","Value":"

Drivers are needed for bottom-up implementation and integration.

"},{"Key":"C","Value":"

Drivers are needed for top-down implementation and integration.

"},{"Key":"D","Value":"

Stubs are needed for bottom-up implementation and integration.

"}]
details.questions:
Which of the following statements is correct?（）
下列哪个语句是正确的（）？
